name: The Dungeon of Destiny
description: The Dungeon of Destiny is a roguelike game with dark atmosphere telling us a story about the man who gets into the mysterious Maze despite of his own will. He is the prisoner and should serve the ancient Order same as the other prisoners of the Maze.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, XP, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, XP, Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 Ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Any 4 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
